og.description: Is Your Government Good Or Bad For Innovation? I know. I know. How could I even suggest government could be remotely helpful when it comes to innovation? Just consider the most frustrating experience you’ve had with government. If you are like most entrepreneurs, you have quite a list from which to choose. Let [...]
